inputs.description: This option is for indicate that will be calculate all the methods existing in the plugin for now

inputs.description: This option is for indicate that will be calculate the Loreta (Low Resolution Electromagnetic Tomography) Method. Reference:Pascual-Marqui, R. D., Michel, C. M. and Lehmann, D. (1994). Low resolution electromagnetic tomography: a new method for localizing electrical activity in the brain. Int. J.Psychophysiol, 18 , 49-65.
inputs.name: Loreta Method

inputs.description: This option is for indicate that will be calculate the Elastic Net with Laplacian Method. Reference: H. Zou, and T. Hastie, Regularization and variable selection via the elastic net. J. Roy. Statist. Soc. Ser. B 67: 301 -320 (2005).
inputs.name: Elastic Net Method

inputs.description: This option is for indicate that will be calculate the Smooth Lasso with Laplacian Method. Reference: M. Hebiri and S van de Geer, The Smooth-Lasso and other ℓ1 + ℓ2-penalized methods. Electronic Journal of Statistics. 5:1184-1226 (2011).
inputs.name: Smooth Lasso Method

inputs.description: This option is for indicate that will be calculate the Non-Negative Smooth Lasso with Laplacian Method. Reference:M. Vega-Hernández, E. Martínez-Montes, J. M. Sánchez-Bornot, A. Lage-Castellanos and P.A. Valdés-Sosa, Penalized least squares methods for solving the EEG inverse problem. Stat. Sin. 18:1535–1551 (2008).
inputs.name: Non-Negative Smooth Lasso Method

inputs.description: Regularization paramater. This input is optional if left at 0 the plugin will estimate it
inputs.name: Lambda parameter

inputs.description: If it is true will be save all the variables otherwise only will be save the beta solutions
inputs.name: Save all the variables
